nodes.description: Master essential developer tools including command line, text editor and Git. Learn the basics of programming with variables, loops, functions, and data structures.
Learn how to write robust, easy-to-maintain code using object-oriented principles.
Begin to understand the Model-View-Controller design pattern and start building applications with this architecture.
Continue with MVC pattern implementation and learn to extract data through web-scraping or APIs.
Apply your knowledge to build a complete recipe management application using the MVC architecture.
Study examples of relational databases and understand database design principles.
Learn SQL for Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations to manage databases effectively.
Master advanced JOIN queries to connect data across multiple tables.
Understand how to use an ORM (Object Relational Mapping) through Active Record to connect your database to your software.
Build a simple blogging application with a database backend. Write scripts to extract data from a music database.
Code with HTML and CSS to build the structure and styling of web pages.
Learn to use Bootstrap 5 framework for responsive layouts and component libraries.
Master CSS page layouts with flexbox and grid to create responsive designs.
Learn modern JavaScript to add dynamic behaviors to your websites.
Practice with key JavaScript frameworks and build dynamic components like chats or todo apps.
Learn to code using Ruby on Rails as the foundation for your web applications.
Develop skills to combine Rails with JavaScript for dynamic front-end experiences.
Set up tests to ensure your code is robust and maintainable.
Learn to deploy your applications to production on a real domain using Heroku.
Work in teams to develop and deploy a marketplace application (similar to Airbnb or Yelp).

bootcampContent.title: Week 5: AI Integration
bootcampContent.subtitle: Build AI features in your apps

nodes.description: Integrate OpenAI API with Rails to add AI features to web applications.
Develop AI chatbots and text generation features in your applications.
Implement retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for enhanced AI accuracy and learn to generate images with AI.
Utilize Copilot for more efficient coding practices and optimize background job processing for AI tasks.
Use websockets to build real-time chat features and other interactive components.

bootcampContent.title: Weeks 6: Final Project
bootcampContent.subtitle: Build your own web & AI app from scratch

nodes.description: Form teams of 3-4 people. Brainstorm, pitch, and plan your original AI-powered web project.
Design your app on Figma, creating wireframes and mockups for your project.
Implement the backend infrastructure using Rails and setup your database schema.
Build the user interface with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript following your designs.
Integrate AI capabilities into your application using the techniques learned throughout the bootcamp.
Test your application, fix bugs, and refine features based on feedback.
Deploy your completed project and prepare to present it to an audience on Demo Day.
